name: Running Out of Power (jlaceydev)
description:
Running Out of Power is the first game made for the Two Week Games challenge. It was originally designed for the theme for Ludum Dare 39. It is a platformer with a robot running out of power. As the robot runs out of power, static fills the screen before the robot completely shuts down. Navigate to the end of each level by collecting energy along the way and avoiding hazards. There are 9 levels to complete, how fast can you do each one?

This game was made for the Two Week Games challenge where Joshua Lacey is making 22 games in the year 2022 to improve his development skills. Check out the site for more info on the development of this game and the others made for the challenge.

Created By:
Joshua Lacey
